description: Configuration and secrets management that sources JSON configs from /etc/vanguard/hela.json (plus user overrides) and rotates secrets on start.
steps: Parse global config at /etc/vanguard/hela.json and optional user overrides while respecting OS file permissions
Expose OAuth client metadata, rate limits, storage/backing store endpoints, and randomization params from these configs
Regenerate server-generated secrets/session keys at startup and purge old tokens
Ensure secrets are stored or referenced via OS secret stores when available
Add config validation tests and secure file permission checks
acceptance_criteria: Config files are consumed only from the approved paths
Secrets are re-created per restart and not persisted in plain text
Config validation fails fast before the service accepts connections
